data.name: RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Good times and bad, war and peace, love and sadness... Cinematic Sountrack brings musical moments from many genres to your game! Fifty total tracks will fill your towns, dungeons, battles, and cutscenes with dramatic sound. Includes the full forty from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release and ten bonus tracks for the MV release!

Features:

- 50 total tracks: the full 40 from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release plus 10 new bonus tracks!
- Looped and alternate mixes for many tracks.
- Music for battles, towns, peaceful times, sadness, mystery, and dark moments of dread!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker MV games.

1 - Battle - Angry Avenger
2 - Battle - Brutal Boss

data.short_description: The Cinematic Soundtrack pack by composer Joel Steudler brings emotion and energy to your game with lush orchestrations, blazing battles, and a vast variety of genres covered. Ten new bonus tracks join the original forty for the RPG Maker MV release!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Soundtrack
